last_episode_to_air.name: VIII NARCISSUS

name: RIPLEY
overview: A grifter in 1960s New York is hired to convince a wealthy man's son to return home from Italy and begins a life of deceit, fraud and murder.

episodes.name: I A HARD MAN TO FIND
episodes.overview: Tom Ripley's life of petty crime in New York City detours with an offer to bring a wealthy man's wayward son home from Europe.

episodes.name: II SEVEN MERCIES
episodes.overview: On Italy's Amalfi Coast, Tom settles into Dickie's grand villa, but not without arousing suspicion from his girlfriend Marge.

episodes.name: III SOMMERSO
episodes.overview: With funds low and his future in Italy in jeopardy, Tom puts a dark scheme into motion.

episodes.name: IV LA DOLCE VITA
episodes.overview: Tom must deal with Marge's deep skepticism before embarking on a new, fictitious life in Rome.

episodes.name: V LUCIO
episodes.overview: Ensconced in a lovely Rome apartment, Tom's perfect life is threatened by the arrival of an unexpected visitor.

episodes.name: VI SOME HEAVY INSTRUMENT
episodes.overview: A ghastly discovery leads Rome police to Tom's doorstep, beginning a game of cat and mouse with its lead investigator.

episodes.name: VII MACABRE ENTERTAINMENT
episodes.overview: As Inspector Ravini expands his murder investigation, an elusive Tom plots his next moves from Sicily.

episodes.name: VIII NARCISSUS
episodes.overview: Tom reinvents himself again, creating an enviable life in Venice â€” as long as his lies hold.
